page.title: 16SUMMARY
page.content: Research fot this D- Block was carried out by 2B3 students (1985) from Wreake Valley Community College. Most if the research was carried out on two day fieldtrips into the area. these were memmorable days, and despite torrential rainfall on both days good fun was had by all. As a class we would like to thank all the local residents in Barsby and South Croxton who spent theit time talking to us and provided us with the infomation. The infomation was typed into the computer by Simon Oakes of the sixth form.
